description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Ancient Cities of the New World. Being travels and explorations in Mexico and Central America from 1857-1882 ... With numerous illustrations. Translated from the French [and abridged] by J. Gonino and Helen S. Conant. [With a portrait and a map.]]" Author: CHARNAY, Claude Joseph Désiré. Contributor: RICE, Allen Thorndike. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10480.eee.22." Page: 535 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1887 Publisher: Harper & Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000668210 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
